      • setRetryPause

        public AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder setRetryPause(long pause,
                                                 TimeUnit unit)
        从接口复制的说明: AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder
        Set the base pause time for retrying. We use an exponential policy to generate sleep time when retrying.
        指定者:
        setRetryPause 在接口中 AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder

      • setMaxAttempts

        public AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder setMaxAttempts(int maxAttempts)
        从接口复制的说明: AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder
        Set the max attempt times for an operation. Usually it is the max retry times plus 1. Operation timeout and max attempt times(or max retry times) are both limitations for retrying, we will stop retrying when we reach any of the limitations.
        指定者:
        setMaxAttempts 在接口中 AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder
        另请参阅:
        AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder.setMaxRetries(int), AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder.setOperationTimeout(long, TimeUnit)

      • setStartLogErrorsCnt

        public AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder setStartLogErrorsCnt(int startLogErrorsCnt)
        从接口复制的说明: AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder
        Set the number of retries that are allowed before we start to log.
        指定者:
        setStartLogErrorsCnt 在接口中 AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder

      • setWriteBufferSize

        public AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder setWriteBufferSize(long writeBufferSize)
        从接口复制的说明: AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder
        Override the write buffer size specified by the provided AsyncConnection's Configuration instance, via the configuration key hbase.client.write.buffer.
        指定者:
        setWriteBufferSize 在接口中 AsyncBufferedMutatorBuilder
